Fuck RARs.

==== Reasons not to use RARS: ====
- RARs waste twice the space on your computer, meaning those low on space have to choose between seeding or deleting the fucking RAR and keeping the video.
- Makes it so you can't see the filenames are in the torrent.
- Makes it so you can't CHOOSE which files in the torrent you need.
- No operating system supports RARs natively, because it's proprietary. Telling us all to get some shitty software so you can waste all our time by uploading a RAR is retarded.
- RAR can't compress already compressed video.
- Nobody gives a shit about verifying the RARs with the release group. You've already downloaded the fucking movie, just watch it to see if it's the real thing. Who gives a shit?
- "It only takes a minute to extract" Fuck that, it should take 0 minutes because it shouldn't be there in the first place.
- I don't give a shit if you are a big deal in "the SCENE". It doesn't impress me. If you were that much of an insider you wouldn't need to "prove it" by uploading RARs and explaining how important they are. Extract the fucking RARs. Nobody wants them.

==== Reasons to use RARS: ====
- To act like you're a cool "SCENE" insider.

@ euphoria4949: There is one very good reason. With rars your downloads takes up twice the amount of space on your hd, if you wish to seed. "1GB isn't much on an average hd"... well it adds up.  I only seed rar'ed files for longer times on private trackers, and frankly don't feel bad about it.
Not watching this version btw. These 1 gb files are just not worth it. I decided to get the HD version allready, so I'm not gonna' halfass it and go for these crappy versions.
